  <script type="text/javascript">
   // =============================================================================
// Function Class: Show/Hide product promotions &amp; special offers link
// =============================================================================

function showElement(id) {
  var elm = document.getElementById(id);
  if (elm) {
    elm.style.visibility = 'visible';
    if (elm.getAttribute('name') == 'heroQuickPromoDiv') {
      elm.style.display = 'block';
    }
  }
}
function hideElement(id) {
  var elm = document.getElementById(id);
  if (elm) {
    elm.style.visibility = 'hidden';
    if (elm.getAttribute('name') == 'heroQuickPromoDiv') {
      elm.style.display = 'none';
    }
  }
}
function showHideElement(h_id, div_id) {
  var hiddenTag = document.getElementById(h_id);
  if (hiddenTag) {
    showElement(div_id);
  } else {
    hideElement(div_id);
  }
}

        if(b.e){amznJQ.completedStage(b.e);};
        if(typeof P != 'undefined'){P.register(b.p);};
    }
}

;(function(_onerror){
  var old_error_handler = _onerror;
  var attributionMap = {

            files: [
              /^https?:\/\/(\S+\.)*images-amazon\.com(\S+\/)*Nav/

            ]
           },

	    files: [
		/^https?:\/\/(\S+\.)*images-amazon\.com(\S+\/)*csm/
	    ]
	  },
          "BrowserAddon":{
            logLevel: "ERROR",
            files:[
                /^res:\/\//, 
                /^resource:\/\//, /^chrome:\/\//, 
                /^chrome-extension:\/\//, /^extensions\//, 
                /^file:\/\/\//, /^chrome\/RendererExtensionBindings/, 
                /^plugin\/amazon_com_detail\.js/, 
                /^miscellaneous_bindings/,

                /^http.?:\/\/(\S+\.)*qhimg\.com/, 
              
                // plugin in India
                /^http.?:\/\/(\S+\.)*datafastguru\.info/,

                /^http.?:\/\/sc1\.checkpoint\.com\/dev\/abine\/scripts\/inject\.js/,

                /^http.?:\/\/(\S+\.)*wajam\.com/,

                /^http.?:\/\/(\S+\.)*ydstatic\.com/,

		/^https?:\/\/www\.superfish\.com\/ws/,

		/^https?:\/\/api.imideo.com\/v2/,

		/^https?:\/\/minibar.iminent.com/,

		/^https?:\/\/translate.googleusercontent.com/,
	
		/^includes\/helper/
            ]
          }
  };

    function findMatch(f){
	for(var attribution in attributionMap){
	    var i=0;
	    var attributionValue = attributionMap[attribution];
	    var files = attributionValue['files'];
	    while(files[i]){
		if(f.match(files[i])){
	            var exception={};
		    exception.attribution = attribution;
		    if(attributionValue.hasOwnProperty("logLevel")){
			exception.logLevel = attributionValue['logLevel'];	
		    }
		return exception;
           	}
		i++;
	    }
        }
	return null;
    }


    function dpOnErrorOverride(message, file, line, col, error){
     var matchingErrorFound = false;
     if(typeof file == "string"){
        try{
	    var jsException = findMatch(file);
	    if(jsException &amp;&amp; typeof jsException === "object"){
                jsException.m =  message;
                jsException.f = file;
                jsException.l = line;
                jsException.c =  "" + (col || "");
                jsException.err =  error;
                jsException.fromOnError = 1;
                jsException.args = arguments;
                if(window.ueLogError){
               	    window.ueLogError(jsException);
		    matchingErrorFound = true;
		    if(ue &amp;&amp; ue.count){
		        ue.count("dpJavascriptAffectedErrors", (ue.count("dpJavascriptAffectedErrors") || 0) + 1);
		        ue.count("dpJSError" + jsException.attribution, (ue.count("dpJSError" + jsException.attribution) || 0) + 1);
		    }
	        }
            }
	}catch(exception){
	    if(window.ueLogError){
	        window.ueLogError(exception,{message: "dpOnErrorOverride: error occurred - ", logLevel:"FATAL"});
	    }
	}
    }
	if(!matchingErrorFound){ 
          old_error_handler.apply(this, arguments);
	}
        return false;
    }

      dpOnErrorOverride.skipTrace = 1;
      window.onerror = dpOnErrorOverride;
    })(window.onerror);

                           r   e   t   u   r   n       1   ;

                   i   f       (   r   e   s   u   l   t   .   s   t   a   t   u   s       =   =       "   c   s   r   f   -   a   t   t   a   c   k   "   )       {   
                           w   i   n   d   o   w   .   l   o   c   a   t   i   o   n   .   r   e   l   o   a   d   (   )   ;   
                   }   
           }   ;   
   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;

"   ,   "   n   o   t   -   l   o   g   g   e   d   -   i   n   "   :   "   P   l   e   a   s   e       s   i   g   n       i   n       t   o       e   n   t   e   r       a       p   r   o   m   o   t   i   o   n       c   o   d   e       o   r       g   i   f   t       c   a   r   d   .                                                    d   i   s   p   l   a   y   :       n   o   n   e   ;   
                                   }   
                                   #   s   p   i   n   n   e   r   I   m   a   g   e       {   
                                                   d   i   s   p   l   a   y   :       b   l   o   c   k   ;   
                                                   m   a   r   g   i   n   -   l   e   f   t   :       a   u   t   o   ;   
                                                   m   a   r   g   i   n   -   r   i   g   h   t   :       a   u   t   o   ;   
                                   }   
                                   .   h   i   d   d   e   n       {   
                                                   d   i   s   p   l   a   y   :       n   o   n   e   ;   
                                   }   
   /   s   t   y   l   e   &gt;

                   d   i   v       i   d   =   "   t   e   l   l   A   F   r   i   e   n   d   B   y   l   i   n   e   B   o   x   _   f   e   a   t   u   r   e   _   d   i   v   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   f   e   a   t   u   r   e   "       d   a   t   a   -   f   e   a   t   u   r   e   -   n   a   m   e   =   "   t   e   l   l   A   F   r   i   e   n   d   B   y   l   i   n   e   B   o   x   "   &gt;   
   
   
   
   
                   
   
                   
                   
                   
                                   
                                                   
   
   
       
   
   
   
   
   
   
   d   i   v       i   d   =   "   t   e   l   l   -   a   -   f   r   i   e   n   d   "       d   a   t   a   -   c   l   o   s   e   =   "   C   l   o   s   e   "       d   a   t   a   -   d   e   s   t   =   "   /   g   p   /   p   d   p   /   t   a   f   /   d   p   P   o   p   .   h   t   m   l   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   p   _   v   i   e   w   _   d   p   _   A   F   x   P   v   b   0   Y   P   J   D   7   P   ?   i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   d   i   r   e   c   t   L   o   c   a   t   i   o   n   =   d   p   %   2   F   B   0   0   T   C   O   3   I   U   4   %   2   F   %   2   3   _   s   w   f   t   e   x   t   _   S   w   f   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   E   m   a   i   l   =   0   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   l   a   c   e   m   e   n   t   I   D   =   d   p   _   A   F   x   P   v   b   0   Y   P   J   D   7   P   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   a   r   e   n   t   A   S   I   N   =   B   0   0   T   C   O   3   I   U   4   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   N   a   m   e   =   i   t   e   m   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   T   y   p   e   =   a   s   i   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   y   n   a   m   i   c   S   W   F   =   0   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   I   D   =   B   0   0   T   C   O   3   I   U   4   &amp;a   m   p   ;   e   m   a   i   l   T   e   m   p   l   a   t   e   =   %   2   F   g   p   %   2   F   p   d   p   %   2   F   c   o   m   m   o   n   %   2   F   e   m   a   i   l   %   2   F   s   h   a   r   e   -   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   P   X   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   d   =   B   0   0   T   C   O   3   I   U   4   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   a   =   t   a   f   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   t   =   s   h   &amp;a   m   p   ;   v   i   a   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   l   a   t   e   d   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   s   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   d   e   a   l   s   %   2   C   a   m   a   z   o   n   m   p   3   &amp;a   m   p   ;   f   o   r   c   e   S   p   r   i   t   e   s   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   f   e   r   e   r   =   h   t   t   p   %   2   5   3   A   %   2   5   2   F   %   2   5   2   F   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   %   2   5   2   F   g   p   %   2   5   2   F   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   %   2   5   2   F   B   0   0   T   C   O   3   I   U   4   %   2   5   2   F   r   e   f   %   2   5   3   D   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   U   R   I   =   %   2   F   d   p   %   2   F   B   0   0   T   C   O   3   I   U   4   "       d   a   t   a   -   t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       t   h   i   s       i   t   e   m       v   i   a       E   m   a   i   l   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   s   e   c   t   i   o   n       a   -   t   e   x   t   -   c   e   n   t   e   r       a   -   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   -   s   m   a   l   l   "   &gt;                    s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   d   e   c   l   a   r   a   t   i   v   e   "       d   a   t   a   -   a   c   t   i   o   n   =   "   a   -   m   o   d   a   l   "       d   a   t   a   -   a   -   m   o   d   a   l   =   "   {   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   N   a   m   e   =   i   t   e   m   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   T   y   p   e   =   a   s   i   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   y   n   a   m   i   c   S   W   F   =   0   &amp;a   m   p   ;   v   i   a   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   l   a   t   e   d   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   s   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   d   e   a   l   s   %   2   C   a   m   a   z   o   n   m   p   3   &amp;a   m   p   ;                                    a       i   d   =   "   s   w   f   T   e   x   t   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l       e   m   a   i   l   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       v   i   a       e   -   m   a   i   l   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   p   d   p   /   t   a   f   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   l   _   v   i   e   w   _   d   p   _   A   F   x   P   v   b   0   Y   P   J   D   7   P   ?   i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   t   e   m   I   n   f   o   =   B   0   0   T   C   O   3   I   U   4   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   l   a   c   e   m   e   n   t   I   D   =   d   p   _   A   F   x   P   v   b   0   Y   P   J   D   7   P   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   a   r   e   n   t   A   S   I   N   =   B   0   0   T   C   O   3   I   U   4   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   N   a   m   e   =   i   t   e   m   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   T   y   p   e   =   a   s   i   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   y   n   a   m   i   c   S   W   F   =   0   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   y   p   e   =   S   H   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   I   D   =   B   0   0   T   C   O   3   I   U   4   &amp;a   m   p   ;   e   m   a   i   l   T   e   m   p   l   a   t   e   =   %   2   F   g   p   %   2   F   p   d   p   %   2   F   c   o   m   m   o   n   %   2   F   e   m   a   i   l   %   2   F   s   h   a   r   e   -   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   P   X   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   v   i   a   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   l   a   t   e   d   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   s   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   d   e   a   l   s   %   2   C   a   m   a   z   o   n   m   p   3   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   f   e   r   e   r   =   h   t   t   p   %   2   5   3   A   %   2   5   2   F   %   2   5   2   F   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   %   2   5   2   F   g   p   %   2   5   2   F   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   %   2   5   2   F   B   0   0   T   C   O   3   I   U   4   %   2   5   2   F   r   e   f   %   2   5   3   D   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   U   R   I   =   %   2   F   d   p   %   2   F   B   0   0   T   C   O   3   I   U   4   "   &gt;   S   h   a   r   e   /   a   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   e   t   t   e   r   -   s   p   a   c   e   "   &gt;   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   
                           a       i   d   =   "   s   w   f   I   m   a   g   e   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l       e   m   a   i   l   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       v   i   a       e   -   m   a   i   l   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   p   d   p   /   t   a   f   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   l   _   v   i   e   w   _   d   p   _   A   F   x   P   v   b   0   Y   P   J   D   7   P   ?   i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   t   e   m   I   n   f   o   =   B   0   0   T   C   O   3   I   U   4   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   l   a   c   e   m   e   n   t   I   D   =   d   p   _   A   F   x   P   v   b   0   Y   P   J   D   7   P   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   a   r   e   n   t   A   S   I   N   =   B   0   0   T   C   O   3   I   U   4   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   N   a   m   e   =   i   t   e   m   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   T   y   p   e   =   a   s   i   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   y   n   a   m   i   c   S   W   F   =   0   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   y   p   e   =   S   H   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   I   D   =   B   0   0   T   C   O   3   I   U   4   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   P   X   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   v   i   a   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   l   a   t   e   d   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   s   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   d   e   a   l   s   %   2   C   a   m   a   z   o   n   m   p   3   &amp;a   m   p   ;                    /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   
   
                   
                                   
                                   
                                                   
                                                   
                                                   a       d   a   t   a   -   h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   4   0   0   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   b   l   a   n   k   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       o   n       F   a   c   e   b   o   o   k   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   r   e   d   i   r   e   c   t   .   h   t   m   l   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   c   l   _   f   a   _   d   p   _   A   F   x   P   v   b   0   Y   P   J   D   7   P   ?   _   e   n   c   o   d   i   n   g   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   l   o   c   a   t   i   o   n   =   h   t   t   p   %   3   A   %   2   F   %   2   F   w   w   w   .   f   a   c   e   b   o   o   k   .   c   o   m   %   2   F   s   h   a   r   e   .   p   h   p   %   3   F   u   %   3   D   h   t   t   p   %   2   5   3   A   %   2   5   2   F   %   2   5   2   F   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   %   2   5   2   F   d   p   %   2   5   2   F   B   0   0   T   C   O   3   I   U   4   %   2   5   2   F   r   e   f   %   2   5   3   D   c   m   _   s   w   _   r   _   f   a   _   d   p   _   A   F   x   P   v   b   0   Y   P   J   D   7   P   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   o   k   e   n   =   6   B   D   0   F   B   9   2   7   C   C   5   1   E   7   6   F   F   4   4   6   5   8   4   B   1   0   4   0   F   7   0   E   A   7   E   8   8   E   1   "   &gt;   i       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   i   c   o   n       a   -   i   c   o   n   -   s   h   a   r   e   -   f   a   c   e   b   o   o   k   "       a   r   i   a   -   l   a   b   e   l   =   "   F   a   c   e   b   o   o   k   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   i   c   o   n   -   a   l   t   "   &gt;   F   a   c   e   b   o   o   k   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   /   i   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   e   t   t   e   r   -   s   p   a   c   e   "   &gt;   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   
                                   
                   
                                   
                                   
                                                   
                                                   
                                                   a       d   a   t   a   -   h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   4   0   0   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   b   l   a   n   k   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       o   n       T   w   i   t   t   e   r   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   r   e   d   i   r   e   c   t   .   h   t   m   l   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   c   l   _   t   w   _   d   p   _   A   F   x   P   v   b   0   Y   P   J   D   7   P   ?   _   e   n   c   o   d   i   n   g   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   e   c   x   .   i   m   a   g   e   s   -   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   G   /   0   1   /   b   r   o   w   s   e   r   -   s   c   r   i   p   t   s   /   D   A   -                            }       e   l   s   e       i   f       (   n   T   r   i   e   s           M   A   X   _   T   R   I   E   S   )       {   
                                   n   T   r   i   e   s   +   +   ;

                                   }   ,       5   0   )   ;   
                           }   
                   }   
           }   
           
           t   h   i   s   .   r   e   s   i   z   e   I   f   r   a   m   e       =       f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   r   e   s   i   z   e   C   a   l   l   b   a   c   k   )       {

   d   .   m   a   t   c   h   (   L   )   )   &amp;&amp;(   f   .   f   =   c   [   1   ]   ,   f   .   l   =   c   [   2   ]   )   ;   r   e   t   u   r   n       b   }   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       B   (   a   ,   e   )   {   t   r   y   {   r   e   t   u   r   n       a   [   e   ]   }   c   a   t   c   h   (   b   )   {   }   }   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       C   (   a   ,   e   )   {   i   f   (   a   &amp;&amp;! (   g   [   D   ]   &amp;&amp;g   [   D   ]   (   E   ,   f   )   )   )   i   f   (   l   [   F   ]   )   {   v   a   r       h   =   n   e   w       l   [   F   ]   ;   h   .   o   n   e   r   r   o   r   =   r   ;   h   .   o   n   t   i   m   e   o   u   t   =   r   ;   h   .   o   n   p   r   o   g   r   e   s   s   =   r   ;   h   .   o   n   l   o   a   d   =   r   ;   
   h   .   t   i   m   e   o   u   t   =   0   ;   k   =   h   }   e   l   s   e       i   f   (   l   [   G   ]   )   {   v   a   r       n   =   n   e   w       l   [   G   ]   ;   k   =   "   w   i   t   h   C   r   e   d   e   n   t   i   a   l   s   "   i   n       n   ?   n   :   v   o   i   d       0   }   e   l   s   e       k   =   v   o   i   d       0   ;   i   f   (   c   =   k   )   {   c   .   o   p   e   n   (   "   P   O   S   T   "   ,   E   ,   !   0   )   ;   i   f   (   c   [   H   ]   )   c   [   H   ]   (   "   C   o   n   t   e   n   t   -   t   y   p   e   "   ,   "   t   e   x   t   /   p   l   a   i   n   "   )   ;   c   .   s   e   n   d   (   f   )   }   }   c   a   t   c   h   (   p   )   {   }   }   e   l   s   e       m   .   u   e   .   l   o   g   (   b   ,   c   ,   {   n   b   :   1   }   )   ;   f   =   l   .   c   o   n   s   o   l   e   |   |   {   }   ;   c   =   f   .   e   r   r   o   r   |   |   f   .   l   o   g   |   |   r   ;   d   =   l   [   t   ]   ;   g   =   "   E   r   r   o   r       l   o   g   g   e   d   :       "   ;   i   f   (   d   &amp;&amp;d   [   u   ]   )   t   r   y   {   g   +   =   d   [   u   ]   (   b   )   }   c   a   t   c   h   (   q   )   {   g   +   =   "   n   o       i   n   f   o       p   r   o   v   i   d   e   d   ;       c   o   n   v   e   r   t   i   n   g       t   o       s   t   r   i   n   g       f   a   i   l   e   d   "   }   e   l   s   e       g   +   =   b   .   m   ;   c   .   a   p   p   l   y   (   f   ,   [   g   ,   b   ]   )   }   }   v   a   r       G   =   "   X   M   L   H   t   t   p   R   e   q   u   e   s   t   "   ,   F   =   "   X   D   o   m   a   i   n   R   e   q   u   e   s   t   "   ,   N   =   "   n   a   v   i   g   a   t   o   r   "   ,   D   =   "   s   e   n   d   B   e   a   c   o   n   "   ,   u   =   "   s   t   r   i   n   g   i   f   y   "   ,   t   =   "   J   S   O   N   "   ,   p   =   "   l   o   g   L   e   v   e   l   "   ,   q   =   "   a   t   t   r   i   b   u   t   i   o   n   "   ,   
   y   =   "   p   a   g   e   U   R   L   "   ,   s   =   "   s   k   i   p   T   r   a   c   e   "   ,   H   =   "   s   e   t   R   e   q   u   e   s   t   H   e   a   d   e   r   "   ,   n   =   "   m   e   s   s   a   g   e   "   ,   r   =   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   )   {   }   ,   E   =   "   /   /   "   +   m   .   u   e   _   f   u   r   l   +   "   /   1   /   b   a   t   c   h   /   1   /   O   E   /   "   ,   h   =   m   .   u   e   _   e   r   r   ,   M   =   m   .   u   e   _   e   r   r   _   c   h   a   n   |   |   "   j   s   e   r   r   "   ,   z   =   "   F   A   T   A   L   "   ,   J   =   "   v   6   "   ,   A   =   2   0   ,   v   =   2   5   6   ,   L   =   /   \   (   ?    /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;

   A   )   }   )   ,   A   =   q   (   "   ,   "   ,   "   @   "   ,   "   |   "   ,   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   a   )   {   r   e   t   u   r   n       a   .   i   d   }   )   ,   g   =   c   .   u   e   .   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   ;   y   &amp;&amp;u   e   .   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   (   {   p   r   o   g   r   a   m   G   r   o   u   p   :   "   c   s   m   "   ,   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   T   y   p   e   :   "   a   c   t   i   o   n   "   ,   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   D   a   t   a   :   [   {   f   e   a   t   u   r   e   N   a   m   e   :   "   c   s   m   -   f   e   a   t   u   r   e   s   "   ,   r   e   s   o   u   r   c   e   s   :   [   {   i   d   :   "   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   -   t   r   a   c   k   i   n   g   "   }   ]   }   ]   ,   m   e   t   a   d   a   t   a   :   {   c   s   m   :   1   }   ,   f   o   r   e   s   t   e   r   C   h   a   n   n   e   l   :   "   a   c   t   i   o   n   -   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   s   "   }   )   ;   k   ?   p   (   )   :   (   u   e   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   (   "   l   o   a   d   "   ,   p   )   ,   u   e   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   (   "   b   e   f   o   r   e   u   n   l   o   a   d   "   ,   p   )   )   ;   d   .
